#include <cstdlib>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    int t;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    int j;
    for(j = 0; j < t; j++)
    {
        char code[1000002];
        scanf("%s", code);
        int r = strlen(code);
        int a[r];
        int cnt = 0;
        int i;
        for(i = 0; i < r; i++)
        {
            a[i] = cnt;
            if(code[i] == 'L')cnt++;
        }
        cnt = 0;
        long long int rez = 0;
        for(i = r-1; i >= 0; i--)
        {
            if(code[i] == 'O')
            {
                rez += a[i]*cnt;
            }
            a[i] = cnt;
            if(code[i] == 'L')cnt++;
        }
        cout << rez << endl;
    }
}
